resources.string:
Crate Loader
People are always going to be playing games on their phone, which is why I designed Crate Loader. Crate Loader is a fun alternative to other games, which also teaches cognitive and logic skills.

Learn how to play: Video

Thanks to:

Orkhan Nadirli - Graphics and Design help
Mr. Borland - General Help.
Matthew Keast - Level Design





Made in Android Studio
